news_header: Fabi Lara discusses the disconnect between uranium sector fundamentals and equity performance, suggesting it's a good time for investors to reconsider their positions.
news_original_title: Fabi Lara: Uranium Thesis is Back, How to Play "Massive" Disconnect
news_text: Fabi Lara from Next Big Rush highlights a significant disconnect between the fundamentals of the uranium sector and the performance of uranium stocks. She notes that while contracts are being signed at increasing prices, retail investors have not yet recognized this trend. Lara believes this presents a great opportunity for those who have not yet invested or are looking to re-enter the market. The interview provides further insights into the uranium sector.
